DONOR_HELP.D_desc: Login or Signup through this module
List of appeal categories is displayed along with the number of appeals in them.
On selecting a category the donor is redirected to the category’s particular appeal.
On selecting a particular appeal it’s details are displayed and the donor can also proceed to make payment from this module only if he/she is logged in.
Proceed to make payment from this module only if he/she is logged in.
List of all registered NGO’s is displayed.
On selecting a particular NGO from the list , details about that particular NGO is displayed.
On selecting a particular NGO from the list , details about that particular NGO is displayed.
On selecting a particular appeal it’s details are displayed and the donor can also proceed to make payment from this module only if he/she is logged in.
Proceed to make payment from this module only if he/she is logged in.
Login or Signup through this module and if donor is logged in, his/her details are displayed. The donor can update his/her details also through this module.
